entry.title: Creating and Hosting this website
entry.summary: Creating this static site with Jekyll (On Windows) and using a custom Theme Jekyll-Theme-Chirpy and hosting it on Github became more of an adventure than I expected. I watched a few youtube videos and they all worked great (on their side) but they where usually on a Linux or a MAC computer and only one of them by Techno Tim (which is the reason I even attempted this) included the use of a cus...
